questions.question: Sam performed a vulnerability assessment on his network and no potential problem was reported. He runs another utility that executes exploits against his system and the utility successfully executes three known exploits against his network. What kind of results did Sam receive from his vulnerability assessment?
Which of the following is/are monitored using host-based intrusion detection systems?
Which of the following is the most suitable detection method for port scanning attack?
Which of the following nmap timers will likely be detected quickly by the intrusion detection system?
Statistical anomaly detect is also ___
answers: used for detecting cross-site scripting attacks
used to flag out normal network traffic activity
